title: Beto O'Rourke | Beg Your Pardons
description:
Today the Jan. 6th Committee painted a chilling and criminally insane portrait of the former president’s attempt to steal the election by weaponizing the Department of Justice, and we also learned the list of Republican members of Congress who begged the former president for pardons. And the Democratic nominee for the governor of Texas, Beto O’Rourke, returns to The Late Show to discuss the effect of new voting restrictions in his state and the extreme positions staked out in the state GOP’s new political platform. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
